FaceCompiler

2019

Built during MatadorHacks 2019, this program uses OpenCV to detect facial structure and aligns them to a reference image to create facial montages. See example use case here

RedditInvestment

2018

Built during HSHacks 2018, this program scrapes "investment" subreddits (such as r/wallstreetbets) and uses a questionable sentiment calculator to make dubious investment decisions automatically and hopefully earns you money
